topComments.author: Alanah McLean
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Como um grupo de 4, reservamos uma massagem, tratamento facial e spa para o anivers√°rio das minhas irm√£s. Que mimo! The massage was divine, the facial was just amazing with some gorgeous products used, and the spa was so beautiful, set atop the hill with an amazing view and a delicious platter as well. topComments.author: Laura Boettcher
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O apartamento em que eu e meu parceiro ficamos para umas f√©rias rom√¢nticas era espa√ßoso, confort√°vel e limpo. No entanto, houve algumas falhas organizacionais, que tiraram um pouco do prazer. O propriet√°rio n√£o controla os detalhes da reserva t√£o bem quanto o esperado para um pacote de spa de dois dias de mais de 600 d√≥lares. Como tal, havia confus√£o sobre a reserva do jantar, que o propriet√°rio compensou cozinhando para n√≥s, afinal. No entanto, o jantar estava uma hora atrasado, o que atrapalhou nosso planejamento.  Al√©m disso, tivemos que esperar por nosso jacuzzi depois de nossa massagem, pois ainda havia pessoas l√°. Fomos ent√£o conduzidos a uma sala de spa que ainda continha a comida dos velhos, que o propriet√°rio limpou, mas deixou migalhas de comida com caro√ßos de cereja e deixou a mesa suja. Tamb√©m havia muita sujeira flutuando sobre a √°gua, que suponho ser proveniente de toda a pele das pessoas tomando banho o dia todo. Isso matou um pouco do romance para n√≥s. No dia seguinte, houve outra falha baseada em uma falha de comunica√ß√£o entre o propriet√°rio e eu em rela√ß√£o √† dura√ß√£o da massagem. Pensei ter explicado que queria uma massagem de 2 horas para mim como presente de anivers√°rio, mas em vez disso recebemos duas massagens de uma hora, que meu parceiro realmente n√£o queria. Concluindo, eu n√£o tive a experi√™ncia rom√¢ntica, √≠ntima e isolada que desejava no meu anivers√°rio. Com as v√°rias falhas e o local repleto de reservas uma ap√≥s a outra, senti que a atmosfera estava um tanto apressada e n√£o realizada com tanta aten√ß√£o aos detalhes como eu gostaria. Como a propriet√°ria tem todo um grupo de funcion√°rios trabalhando para ela 24 horas (massoterapeutas e limpadores), isso me surpreendeu.  (Original) The apartment my partner and I stayed in for a romantic holiday was spacious, comfortable and clean. However, there were some organisational glitches, which took some of the enjoyment away. The owner does not keep track of the booking details as well as should be expected for an over 600 dollar two day spa package. As such, there was confusion about the dinner booking, which the owner made up for by cooking for us after all. However, dinner was an hour late, which interfered with our planning.  Also, we had to wait for our jacuzzi after our massage as there were still people in there. We were then led into a the spa room that still had the old people's food in there, which the owner cleaned up but left food crumbs cherry pips and left the table uncleaned. There was also a lot of grime floating atop the water, which I assume came from all of the people's skin bathing in their all day. That killed some of the romance for us. On the next day, there was another glitch based on a miscommunication between the owner and myself vis-a-vis the length of the massage. I thought I had explained that I wanted a 2 hour massage for myself as a birthday gift, but instead we received two one hour massages, which my partner actually didn't want. In conclusion, I didn't have the romantic intimate and secluded experience I had wished for for my birthday. With the various glitches and the place being packed with bookings one after the other, I felt the atmosphere was rather rushed and not carried out with as much attention to detail as I would have liked. Since the owner has a whole group of staff working for her around the clock (massage therapists and cleaners), this surprised me.
